name: Diaphi's Glow
description:
Enigmatic game, find the stones guided by your light to open your way. Pay attention to the different colours.

A geometrical shape has been used to represent Diaphi the little creature on the loading screen while I have time to model it.

All that's missing now is a little in-game tutorial, but I won't have time to rework the project before the time runs out, but I'll do it in time.

Will you be able to discover the whole map? By solving all the puzzles? Look everywhere, and don't forget to look up :)

You have to solve little puzzles to advance in the game by being guided by your creature named "Diaphi".

All the content was created between 30/07/2020 and 02/08/2020. Cumulated to my working days so I could only spend my nights on it... But I'm proud of it !

Controls:
     Directional arrows -> Direction
     OR
     D -> Right
     A -> Left
     W -> Forward
     S -> Backward

     Left Clic to interact
     Escape to quit

I'm alone on this project

Installation:

Download the Zip file, then extract it. Execute the .EXE file 

Solutions will be posted on 02/08/2020.
